item.title: Tiger add a quote by Alfred de Musset
item.description: "How glorious it is – and also how painful – to be an exception. " -- Alfred de Musset

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Ansel Adams
item.description: "No man has the right to dictate what other men should perceive, create or produce, but all should be encouraged to reveal themselves, their perceptions and emotions, and to build confidence in the creative spirit." -- Ansel Adams

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "Lord, if I thought you were listening, I'd pray for this above all: that any church set up in your name should remain poor, and powerless, and modest. That it should wield no authority except that of love. That it should never cast anyone out. That it should own no property and make no laws. That it should not condemn, but only forgive." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Camille Paglia
item.description: "Gay men are guardians of the masculine impulse. To have anonymous sex in a dark alleyway is to pay homage to the dream of male freedom. The unknown stranger is a wandering pagan god. The altar, as in pre-history, is anywhere you kneel." -- Camille Paglia

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Bill Nye
item.description: "Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't." -- Bill Nye

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Truman Capote
item.description: "The village of Holcomb stands on the high wheat plains of western Kansas, a lonesome area that other Kansans call “out there." -- Truman Capote

item.title: Tiger add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Tiger add a quote by Margaret Drabble
item.description: "Perhaps the rare and simple pleasure of being seen for what one is compensates for the misery of being it." -- Margaret Drabble

item.title: Tiger add a quote by River Jaymes
item.description: "Jesus had two Dads and he turned out okay." -- River Jaymes
